version_description:
(1) Camera Roll: Create better Stories with the photos taken from your phone. 
(2) Reorder Photos: Find this feature at My Story -> Reorder
(3) Glitch Fix: Members you haven’t seen yet are now prioritized

(1) Camera Roll: Create better Stories with the photos taken from your phone. 
(2) Reorder Photos: Find this feature at My Story -> Reorder
(3) Glitch Fix: Members you haven’t seen yet are now prioritized

(1) Camera Roll: Create better Stories with the photos taken from your phone. 
(2) Reorder Photos: Find this feature at My Story -> Reorder
(3) Glitch Fix: Members you haven’t seen yet are now prioritized

Introducing membership subscriptions, designed to help you find your next relationship.
• Send unlimited Impressions to find the right person sooner.
• Preferences for height, religion, and ethnicity to narrow your focus.
• Access to Insiders, with expert advice on telling your Story & connecting.
• Join the community of people who want more.

CAPTIONS
Pictures say 1,000 words, but sometimes you need 1,004.
Captions and locations can be added to all photos in your Story.
Tap any photo with a caption icon to read it.

Improvements to messaging speed and consistency

NEW INFORMATION TO HELP YOU FIND THE RIGHT PERSON
Job Title
Kids
Family Plans
Politics
Education Level
Drinking / Smoking / Marijuana / Drugs

FIXED
Unexpected logouts

REDESIGN
Easier to navigate
Easier to discover new people

NEW MEMBERSHIP SETTINGS
Complete your profile and get:
- More likes to send each day
- Access to preferences for religion, ethnicity, and height

Subscribe and get:
- Unlimited likes to send each day
- Access to new preferences for smoking, drinking, politics, education, and more.

- Access to new preferences for smoking, drinking, politics, education, and more.

SHARING IS CARING
See someone who would be perfect for a friend? Share them with our new share feature!

INSTAGRAM FEED - NEW IN 5.2
Share your recent Instagram posts on your profile.

SHARE - NEW IN 5.1
See someone who would be perfect for a friend? Share them with our new share feature!
Instagram video! You can now share your latest Instagram videos in your profile, so show off a little!
Get moving with video! Replace a profile photo with a video from your Camera Roll or Instagram.  Profiles with video will get a 5x exposure boost!
Get moving with video! Replace a profile photo with a video from your Camera Roll or Instagram.  Profiles with video will get a 5x exposure boost!

UPDATED PROFILE EDITOR
Easier to make changes
Answers can now be reordered

UPDATED PROFILE EDITOR
Easier to make changes

Double-tap to like
Bug fixes and UI improvements

UPDATED
Updated with Swift 4 and ready for iOS11!
Larger answers! The answers on people’s profile are more likely to start a conversation so we wanted to give them the space they deserve.
Larger answers! The answers on people’s profile are more likely to start a conversation so we wanted to give them the space they deserve. Performance improvements.

HIDE MATCHES
Focus on the conversations that matter the most!

DEGREES OF CONNECTION
"So random,” said no one on Hinge, ever. Hinge now clearly displays how you’re connected to people, up to three degrees away.

Get ready to meet more of your friends’ single friends! We’ve moved mutual and shared friends to the top of profiles so you know who you’re matching through right away. Plus, in addition to liking prompts, photos, and videos, you can “like” that you share friends! Also new in this release: know when your match is typing something in response to you with new typing indicators.

CHAT UPDATES
“Sent” confirmations - Don’t worry, no read receipts.
Updated designs - Matching the rest of the app.
Improved performance - Faster, more reliable.

Timestamps make the world go round.

Not really, but they make it possible to see when your match last messaged, and they’re included in this release.

Also included: in app notifications that let you know via dropdown when you get a new message or match, redesigned login and onboarding screens, and performance improvements. Get Hinge-ing!

Introducing: phone number sign-in, no Facebook required!
Introducing: phone number sign-in, no Facebook required!
Introducing: phone number sign-in, no Facebook required!

Introducing: Most Compatible, the top daily Hinge member we think you'll be interested in dating, who is also most likely to be interested in you. And it really works: Hinge members are 8x more likely to go on a date with their Most Compatible than they are with other Hinge recommendations.


Update and open Hinge to check it out!

Did you know? Hinge is the most-mentioned app in the New York Times wedding section!

In this release: we've increased the number of likes you can send (which has lead to 20% more dates in our test markets!) and incorporated people who like you into your Discover. Preferred members can also view their incoming likes through their match drawer.

As always, we'd love to know your thoughts on these updates. Let us know via IG @hinge or on Twitter @HingeApp!

Thanks for choosing Hinge to find your next date! We've made improvements to the app and added a link to our safe dating tips. We love to hear how your dates are going. Let us know at success@hinge.co.

Thanks for choosing Hinge to find your next date! We've made improvements to the app and added a link to our safe dating tips. We love to hear how your dates are going. Let us know at success@hinge.co.

We’ve added a brand new way to hear how your dates are going and learn your type. Check out “We Met” in your Matches to give us feedback on your Hinge dates! (Note: all feedback is private. Your Matches will never be notified.)

We’ve added a brand new way to hear how your dates are going and learn your type. Check out “We Met” in your Matches to give us feedback on your Hinge dates! (Note: all feedback is private. Your Matches will never be notified.)

Additionally:
Bug fixes and performance improvements

The Hinge chat experience just got even better. Our engineers have been hard at work to make your chats faster and more reliable, so you never miss a message — update the app and check it out!

Additionally: bug fixes and performance improvements.

The Hinge chat experience just got even better. Our engineers have been hard at work to make your chats faster and more reliable, so you never miss a message — update the app and check it out!

Additionally: more bug fixes and performance improvements!

Big news over here: the "Likes You" tab is back! Immediately see who likes you, with Discover separated out for easy profile browsing. 

Also: bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Previously: Big news over here: the "Likes You" tab is back! Immediately see who likes you, with Discover separated out for easy profile browsing.
Happy Holidays from Hinge! Check out the latest version of the app for bug fixes and performance improvements.
Happy New Year from the Hinge team! This release contains various bug fixes and performance improvements.
New look, same Hinge! Our redesigned app is here, with all the same functionality you’re used to. Check it out and let us know what you think.

New look, same Hinge! Our redesigned app is here, with all the same functionality you’re used to. Check it out and let us know what you think.

Also in this release: bug fixes and performance improvements.
Think you missed out on someone special? No sweat. Introducing Undo, an easy way to bring back someone you accidentally skipped.
We’ve expanded gender identity options for increased inclusivity.

Introducing Photo Prompts, a new way to frame photos on your profile and show off even more of your personality. Add Photo Prompts to your profile today and make it that much easier to kickstart a conversation. Hinge, the dating app designed to be deleted.

Introducing Photo Prompts, a new way to frame photos on your profile and show off even more of your personality. Add Photo Prompts to your profile today and make it that much easier to kickstart a conversation. Hinge, the dating app designed to be deleted.

Dating's hard enough without social distancing. But 70% of Hinge Members say they would be up for a phone or video call first date. No pressure, just keep it short and fun!
Dating's hard enough without social distancing. But 70% of Hinge Members say they would be up for a phone or video call first date. No pressure, just keep it short and fun!
Video chat to help you instantly talk to your match face to face while practicing safe social distancing.
Video chat to help you instantly talk to your match face to face while practicing safe social distancing.
Introducing Standouts and Roses. Our latest features designed to help you start conversations with outstanding people who are most your type.
Introducing Standouts and Roses. Our latest features designed to help you start conversations with outstanding people who are most your type.

Bug fixes and performance improvements

---------------------------

Introducing Standouts and Roses. Our latest features designed to help you start conversations with outstanding people who are most your type.

Hinge is committed to being a welcoming, inclusive, and helpful dating app for LGBTQ+ daters. That’s why we've improved how non-binary and other LGBTQ+ daters represent themselves and search for their person. Now, Hinge daters can choose a third gender category, “Non-binary.”

*mic check mic check*
From the sound of a laugh to a neighborhood soundtrack, new Voice Prompts are helping people express themselves in more ways than just 150 characters. We're hearing it all, and we can't wait to hear more.
PS: Dear TikTok, no one is being fired for this update.
